src_text: Maemo a Kabinete ka ga merero ye e lego ditabeng ka seemong sa bjale Kabinete e lebogi it e Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo, dihlogo t a dikolo, baruti i le Baithuti ka ga go ruma ka katlego ditlhahlobong t a Setifikeiti sa Boset haba sa Marematlou sa 2013.Kabinete e amogela tokollo ya Diteko t a Boset haba t a Ngwaga ka Ngwaga t a 2013 lehono, 4 Manthole 2013, yeo e lego seelo se se botse seo se thu ago Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo go ela hloko kgatelopele ya dipoelo t a go ithuta le go kaonafat a boleng bja thutKabinete e tumi a Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo le Khomi ene ya Mopresidente ya Peakanyo ya Mananeokgoparara (PICC) ka ga kgato ye e gatet ego pele ya kabo ya dipuku t a go bala, dipukut homo, thoto ya ka phapo ing, le go neelana ka sekolo se setee ka beke go tloga ka 22 Mosegamanye 2013, bjalo ka Lenaneo la Mananeokgoparara a Boset hab Kabinete e amoget e thakgolo ya Moepo wa Kepo wa Stanley Nkosi wa Khamphani ya Mankanese ya Kgalagadi Hotazel, Kapa Leboa, woo e lego polante ye kgolokgolo ya t hilo ya mankanese lefasen Se se bopa karolo ya sehlopha sa diprot eke t e di sepet wago ke PICC, ye e etilwego pele ke Mopresidente Jacob Zum Ka prot eke ye, Kapa Leboa e bile le letseno la go ka ba R6,5 bilione, mo mengwageng ye mene, ka me omo ya thwii ya go balelwa go 3 000 ye e hlot wego, le mabokgoni a a hlabollwago magareng a baswa ba ka gare ga nag Mopresidente Jacob Zuma o tla etapele Let at i la Poelano ka la 16 Manthole go la Meago ya Pu o ka fase ga kgwekgwe ye e rego:

trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the 16 African nations and their supporters participating in the third Orange African Nations Championship (CHAN) between 11 January and 1 February 2014 in South Afric Hosting the tournament will allow South Africa to build on the positive legacy of the 2010 FIFA World Cup and the 2013 Africa Cup of Nations, and further entrench social cohesion and national pridThe tournament also presents an opportunity for South Africans to showcase our country as a vibrant tourism, trade and investment destinatioOver this holiday season, government is leading a range of campaigns in partnership with all sectors of society to ensure responsible and safe behaviou Foremost among these are Healthy Lifestyles, Arrive Alive, 16 Days of Activism and World AIDS Day Campaign All South Africans must play their part in giving meaning to these campaign Government cannot do it alonOver this period the increased visibility of law enforcement officials at roadblocks and search operations countrywide will ensure that South Africans are safRoad-users are reminded not to drink and drive, or drink and wal Those found guilty of transgressing the rules will be dealt with to the full extent of the la Cabinet calls on all South Africans to take extra precautions to ensure that our children are cared for and kept away from har It is the duty and responsibility of parents, guardians and society to ensure the safety of our children, especially over this upcoming perio Being the last Cabinet meeting for 2013, members of the Executive wish all South Africans a restful, peaceful and safe festive seaso Cabinet calls on all of us who can, to put Ubuntu/Botho in practice by assisting those individuals and families that are unable to support themselves, and to show compassion as a nation that cares for and respects each other Key Cabinet

trg_text: to decide on this were the following: the need for speed on digital migration, especially to release radio frequency spectrum;ensure that the government subsidy is used productively;stimulate the local electronics industry and create jobs;benefit emerging entrepreneurs;reduce prospects of the South African market being flooded by cheap Set Top Boxes (STBs) that are not fully functional;protect the interests of the SABC;be sensitive to rapid changes in the broadcasting and ICT sector as a whole;reduce the extent of monopolization and encourage competition by hold-up the migration procesTaking these and other criteria together, Cabinet decided that the use of a control system should not be mandator The STBs will, however, have a control system to protect noted the public consultation processes conducted for the finalisation of the National Water Policy RevieThe new Water Policy Positions adopts the position of developmental water management, which addresses the linkages between water management and developmental and transformational goals of governmen This considers the entire water value chain with regards to how water can contribute to achieving equitable, beneficial and sustainable development across the country	Cabinet approved the process of realigning Water Boards into nine Regional Water Utilitie This follows the final report on the proposed reform of Water Board	The core business of Regional Water Utilities will be to develop and manage regional bulk infrastructure (water supply and water resource) including financing, project development and ongoing operations and maintenanc This will enable better provision of support to local government, which is a key requirement of the overall sector refor	Cabinet welcomed the implementation of the Human Papiloma Virus (HPV) vaccine, which will be administered six months apart, in 2014, to girls aged 9-10 years through the Integrated School Health Programm This is in line with the World Health Organisation s recommendatio	The aim is to reduce the risk of girls developing cervical cancer later in life, and will contribute towards improving women s quality of life and increasing their life expectancy and also significantly reduce prevalence of non-communicable chronic disease 3 BillsCabinet approved the gazetting of the draft Agr ment South Africa Bill, 2013 and to, among others, evaluate the fitness-for-purpose of non-standardised construction related products or systems for use in the construction industry, and for which a national standard does not exisThis will contribute to the creation of a dynamic and innovative construction industry that positively impacts on job creation while contributing to Governments infrastructure plan	Cabinet src_text: Se se ama t haene ya boleng bja meetse ka moka mabapi le ka moo meetse a kgathago tema go fihlelela tlhabollo ya go swarelela, mohola le go lekana go kgabaganya nagKabinete e amoget e tshepet o ya peakanyoleswa ya Diboto t a Meetse ka Ditirelo t a Meetse t a Selete t e senyanMo omo wo mogolo wa Ditirelo t a Meetse t a Selete e tla ba go hlabolla le go laola mananeokgoparara a mant i a selete (kabo ya meetse le mothopo wa meetse) go akaret wa thekgo ya dit helete, tlhabollo ya diprot eke le ditshepedi o le tlhokomelo t a ka mehl Se se tla kgont ha kabo ye kaone ya thekgo go pu oselegae, yeo e lego senyakwa se segolo sa phetogo ya Lekala ka kakaret Kabinete e amoget e phethagat o ya kalafi ya Twat i ya Papiloma ya Batho, yeo e tlago diri wa ka go kgaogana ka dikgwedi t e tshela, ka 2014, go basetsana ba mengwaga ye 9-10 ka Lenaneo la Maphelo le le kopant wego la Dikol Se se sepet ana le t hi inyo ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo wa LefasMaikemi et o ke go fokot a kotsi ya basetsana ya go swarwa ke kankere ya molomo wa popelo moragonyana mo bophelong, gomme e tla kgatha tema kaonafat ong ya boleng bja bophelo bja basadi le go oket a paka ya go phela bja bona, gape le go fokot a kudu go ata ga malwet i a go se alafege ao a sa fetelegegoMelaokakanywaKabinete e amoget e go ngwalwa ga sengwalwa sa Molaokakanywa wa Afrika Borwa wa Kwano, 2013 ka kuranteng ya Mmu o le Memorantamo wa Diteng t a Molaokaknywa gore set haba se dire ditshwayotshwaySengwalwa sa Molaokakanywa se dumelela temogo ya Kwano ya Afrika Borwa, bjalo ka setheo sa set hab Boto ya Kwano ya Afrika Borwa e filwe maatla a go, magareng ga a mangwe, sekaseka kgotsofat o ya morero ya mekgwa goba dit welet wa t a go amana le kago t e di sego t a lekanet wa go
trg_text: Ms Thembeka Mdlulwa (Non-Executive Member)b)

src_text: omi wa ka intastering ya kago, gomme yeo tekanet o ya yona ya boset haba e sego gonSe se tla kgatha tema tlholong ya intasteri ya kago ya boithomelo le phetogo yeo e huet ago tlholo ya me omo botse mola e kgatha tema dipeakanyong t a mananeokgoparara a Mmu Kabinete e amoget e tsebi o ya Molaokakanywapheto wa wa Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Borwa bja Afrika wa 2013 ka Palamenten Molaokakanywa o fetola Molao wa Borwa bja Afrika wa Panka ya Tlhabollo wa 1997.Nepi o ya leano ya Molaokakanywapheto wa ke go kgont ha katolo o ya ditshepedi o t a Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Borwa bja Afrika go mollwane ofe goba ofe wa boset haba mo kontinenteng ya Afrika le dihlakahlakeng t a yona t a lewatl Se se tla kgont ha Panka go kgatha tema ka mananeokgoparara a mo omo wo mogolo le diprot eke t e dingwe t a maano ka ntle ga selete sa Dinaga t e di Hlabologago t a Borwa bja Afrika yeo e nago le kgonagalo ya go kaonafat a kgwebo le kgolo ya ekonomi mo kontinenteng le go thekga dikhomi ene t a Afrika Borwa t a dinaga t e pedi le maikgafo kopant hong ya seletKabinete e amoget e gore sengwalwa sa Molaokakanywa wa molawana wa Lekala la Matlotlo se swanet e go lokollwa gore set haba se dire ditshwayotshwayo go phethagat a maikgafo a Afrika Borwa go G-20.Maikemi et o a Molaokakanywa ke go dira gore Lekala la matlotlo e be le le bolokegilego ka go phethagat a mokgwa wa taolo wa
trg_text: Ms Nalini Maharaj (Non-Executive Member)d)

src_text: katlegopedi , r tlholo ya balaodi ba babedi: maikarabelo a motee ke polokego le seemo se se botse sa diinstit hu ene t a matlotlo gomme maikarabelo a yo mongwe ke tsela yeo diinstit hu ene t a matlotlo di sepet ago kgwebo ya t ona ka gonaBao ba thwet wego me omongKabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Mohumagadi Esther Sarah Makau maemong a Mohlankedimogolo wa Matlotlo wa Kgoro ya Bokgabo le Set o Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa ga batho ba ba latelago mo omong wa Kgoro ya Dikgokagano:a) Reneva Fourie maemong a Motlat amolaodipharephare: Tlhabollo ya Tshedimo o ya Set haba le Dinyaki i o;b) Tinyiko Moses Ngobeni maemong a Motlat amolaodipharephare: Tlhabollo ya Mananeokgoparara a ICT;c) Sibongile Vulikhaya Makopi maemong a Motlat amolaodipharephare: Tlhabollo ya Kgwebo ya ICT le Tekolo ya Dikhamphani t a Mmu Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Siyakhula Paradise Simelane maemong a Mohlankedimogolo wa Matlotlo wa Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagae le Peakanyoleswa ya NagKabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong la bobedi ga Siyabulela Thomas Tsengiwe maemong a Mokhomi enaremogolo wa Khomi ene ya Tshepedi o ya Kgwebo ya Bodit habat habKabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Mohumagadi Thezi Rosemary Mabuza maemong a Motlat amokhomi enare wa Khomi ene ya Boset haba ya Badiri Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Morena Themba Thomas Cyril Dlamini maemong a Mohlankedimogolo Phethi i (CEO) wa Boto ya Boset haba ya go KempolKabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga Ramolao Solomon Makhosini Msibi maemong a Mohlankedimogolophethi i wa Koporasi ya Taolo ya Sephethephethe Ditselen
trg_text: Pro Gordan Sibiya (Chairperson)b)

src_text: Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago bao e sego Malokophethi i go Koporasi ya Taolo ya Sephethephethe Ditselena) Mohumagadi Thembeka Mdlulwab) Morena Ike Nxedlanac) Mohumagadi Nalini Maharajd) Morena Rowan Graham Nichollse) Mohumagadi Morwenyane Maria Mathabathef) Morena Zola Malvern Percival Majavug) Morena Sam LedwabaKabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago maemong a Balaodi ba e sego Malokophethi i go Boto ya Kantoro ya Poso ya Afrika Borwa:a) Morena Templeton Magezab) Morena Sihle Joel Ngubanec) Mohumagadi Selebaleng Primrose (Boitumelo) Mothelesid) Morena Sathiaseelan Gounden Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago go Thakgolo ya Boto ya Institshute ya Boset haba ya Tahlo ya Dit hila t a Kediso:a) Profesa Gordan Sibiya (Modulasetulo)b) Clive Douglas Knealec) Eric Peter McDonaldd) Queen Nothando Gopoe) Mathews Mateo Mathebef) Ngaka Margaret Msongi Mkhosig) Nolwazi Zandile Cobbinahh) Justin Daniel Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago go Baemedi ba go Hlaolwa ke Mongmo omo go Sekhwama sa Phen ene ya Ba omi ba Mmu o:a) Morena Stadi Mngomezulu (Matlotlo a Boset haba)b) Morena Bhekithemba Thabo Gamedze (Tona ya Matlotlo)c) Ngaka Renosi Mokate (Tona ya Matlotlo)d) Ngaka Malcolm Barry Kistnasamy (Kgoro ya Maphelo)e) Mohumagadi Gladys Modise (Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo)f) Mohumagadi Esther Euphane Aletta (Barbara) Watson (Kgoro ya Tirelo le Taolo ya Set haba)g) Morena Nkhangweleni Seth Makhani (Kgoro ya T hirelet o )h) Mohumagadi Moira-Anne Moses (Koporasi ya Peelet o ya Set haba)Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa mo omong ga batho ba ba latelago Baemedi ba go Emela Bahlaolwa ba Mongmo omo:i) Mohumagadi Lindy Ann Bodewig (Matlotlo a Set haba)j) Ramolao Lindiwe Grace Nkosi-Thomas (Tona ya Matlotlo)k) Morena

src_text: Abel Sithole (Tona ya Matlotlo)l) Ngaka Thamizhanban Pillay (Kgoro ya Maphelo)m) Ngaka Mogenthiran Shunmugam (Morgan) Pillay (Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo)n) Ngaka Lesiba Alex Mahapa (Kgoro ya Tirelo ya Tirelo le Taolo ya Set haba)o) Brigadier Johan David Griesel (Tirelo ya Maphodisa a Afrika Borwa)p) Mohumagadi Rejane Woodroffe (Koporasi ya Peelet o ya Set haba) Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa ga Morena Andrew Zaloumis la bobedi maemong a Mohlankedimogolophethi i wa Lekala la Phaka ya Mohlaka wa iSimangalis Kabinete e amoget e go thwalwa ga batho ba ba latelago la bobedi ga Molaodi wa Boset haba wa Mabaka a Kgapelet a) Morena Jeff Molobela (Modulasetulo)b) Morena Nico Vermeulen (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)c) Mohumagadi Funzani Asnath Melato (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)d) Mohumagadi Susanna Elizabeth Moolman (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)e) Profesa Sadhasivan Perumal (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)f) Mohumagadi Dora Ndaba (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)g) Morena Paul Serote (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)h) Morena Sipho Reginald Zikode (Yo e sego Lelokophethi i)Dipot i o: Phumla Williams (Seboleledi sa Kabinete sa Mot waoswere)Mogala: 083 501 0139Issued by: Government Communications
